text: Ne boola mbu: “ buno ni obulaamba okurula khu Nyasaye wenyu’’ kho ulia wenya asuubile ne owenya akhaye efwe khwarecheshela ababii omulilo, okwe tsikhwi tsiakwo tsilibabotokhana . Ne nibenya obukhonyi balikhonywa amatsi shinga shichuma shisalulusibwe shisaamba obweni, eshinywebwa eshibi shili shirie shino! Nende habandu ali abii arie hano
